RootTable.Filter: select s.ScriptCategory, s.ScriptName, s.ScriptAuthor, s.Notes, s.Script from t_script s where s.Script like '<Search Term>' and s.Notes like '<Group%' union all select s.ScriptCategory, s.ScriptName, s.ScriptAuthor, s.Notes, s.Script from t_script s inner join t_script s1 on s1.ScriptName = s.ScriptAuthor where s1.script like '<Search Term>' and s1.Notes like '<Group%' order by ScriptCategory, ScriptName #DB=COMMENT# Find the script groups that have a name like the given search term. Find also the scripts in those script groups. Use search term `eamt-%` to find the scripts and script groups from EA Modelling Tools JavaScript #DB=COMMENT#
